Package com.fasterxml.clustermate.jaxrs

Package that contains glue code between "native" interface storage system exposes, and JAX-RS container itself: mostly just resource end points.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IndexResource
    Resource that handles access to index file(s) (root page) and favicon.
    JaxrsHttpRequest  
    JaxrsHttpResponse  
    StoreResource<K extends EntryKey,E extends StoredEntry<K>>
    Main resource to interface with storage system when deploying on a JAX-RS container, exposing basic CRUD (PUT, GET, DELETE) entry points.
    StreamingContentAsStreamingOutput
    Glue class that turns a StreamingResponseContent into JAX-RS StreamingOutput object
    StreamingJson  

Package com.fasterxml.clustermate.jaxrs Description

Package that contains glue code between "native" interface storage system exposes, and JAX-RS container itself: mostly just resource end points. Separation added to allow alternate deployments on things like plain old servlet containers.
